titleInfo.title: Martha White Flour Co. Job No. 37377

mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1928) for an order placed by the Martha White Flour Co. for 100 two color window cards for a performance by Earl Scruggs and Lester Flatts at the Anna Jonesboro High School Gym on October 7. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
